attributes.action: Close Jobcentres in England and use the money to secure jobs for those who are longterm unemployed in the private sector by incentives to existing organisations
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Jobcentre Plus is an organisation, which is ineffectual and out of date. The money is better spent on incentives to the private recruitment industry who process the required skills to offer suitable opportunities to the long-term unemployed as it is in the society’s interests.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
